pages.md:
# SCREEN SETTING

Make changes to display settings.

To access display settings, press **MENU/OK**, select the !SET UP tab, and choose **SCREEN SET-UP**.

!Screen Setting Menu

## VIEW MODE SETTING

Adjust settings for eye sensor, EVF (electronic viewfinder), or LCD monitor view modes (ðŸ“– 14).

## EVF BRIGHTNESS

Adjust the brightness of the display in the electronic viewfinder.

| Option | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| AUTO   | Automatic brightness adjustment. |
| MANUAL | Adjust brightness manually; choose from options between âˆ’7 and +5. |

## EVF COLOR

Adjust the hue of the display in the electronic viewfinder.

| Options |
|---------|
| âˆ’5, âˆ’4, âˆ’3, âˆ’2, âˆ’1, 0, +1, +2, +3, +4, +5 |
